Bio

I am a tech enthusiast who is highly motivated about software development. I like learning: I am a believer of Knowledge Is Power. During my leisure time, I enjoy playing chess, reading fictional material, drawing, and playing video games. My career goal is to become a Senior Full-Time Software and Web Developer.
